attributes.action: Consider savers living on falling investment income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We wish the Prime Minister to consider the plight of the prudent and loyal investers in National Savings who rely on their interest to live and who will be sorely pressed if interest rates fall as far as indicated.
It was after all interest rates being too low for too long in the US that caused the sub-prime crisis, the pre-cursar of todays problems.
